How long will my EV take to charge?

The typical time to charge an electric car can take as little as 30 minutes or up to 12 hours. This depends on the size of the battery of your electric car and the speed of the charging point.

Select your model below to find out how long it will take to charge your EV.

How much will it cost?

As a new electric car owner, the first question you would ask is how much does it cost to charge my EV?

Charging an electric car at home costs around £3.00 for a full charge. The average overnight electricity rate is 10p per kWh, which means charging your car for as little as 2p per mile.
